title: Create Inbox Monitoring Automation
description: Implement automated inbox monitoring for AI agents with configurable alerts and session startup integration
background: Agents currently check inbox manually at session startup using inbox-query.py. There's no automated notification when high-priority items arrive. This could cause SLA violations for blocks_sprint urgency items.
rationale: Reduce response time and improve SLA compliance. Enable proactive inbox monitoring rather than reactive checking. Support the 4-hour acknowledgment SLA for blocks_sprint items.
